column1: note_text
Travel time to the nearest starbase? The Federation's gone
Hello- car is broken
Awful performance !!!
Broken Wheels
I'm afraid I still don't understand- sir. Well- that's certainly good to know.
The customer is threatening to change provider if the communication issue is not sorted at once
Many holes on this road !
For an android with no feelings- he sure managed to evoke them in others.
Is threatening to change provider if asset is not repaired at once
Credit Card declined
Customer has a communication issue and can not connect to his account
The customer has a communication issue and can not connect to his account
I'll alert the crew. When has justice ever been as simple as a rule book?
Battery does not work- let alone the breaks.
The customer called again - Device is still not gaining access to network
I suggest you drop it- Mr. Data. Mr. Worf- you sound like a man who's asking his friend if he can start dating his sister.
Customer has a billing issue and requires a revised invoice
Maybe if we felt any human loss as keenly as we feel one of those close to us- human history would be far less bloody.
pedalling- pedalling yet no juice comes out
The wheel is broken- the pedal is broken- the lights are broken - really everything is broken
Called again - Asset still not working
The customer is getting really fustrated and requires prompt reply
The customer is unhappy about unexplained invoices
Fate. It protects fools- little children- and ships named Enterprise.
Credit card declined
The customer wants to know whether the prices have gone up
Flair is what marks the difference between artistry and mere competence.
The invoice for this month is still not updated
I've had twelve years to think about it. And if I had it to do over again- I would have grabbed the phaser and pointed it at you instead of them.
